title: Bug 5048Too many declarations in hierarchy of (jdt)Parser.initialize()
OB: Build 204In a selfhosting workspace, open type Parser (from JDT), and select itsinitialize() method in outliner.Request to search declarations in hierarchy, it incorrectly finds over100 matches, as if it was not taking into account the accurate location ofthe Parser.
